title: E104 The Golden Girls Horror Crossover and a Cousin Cat
description:
White knuckle and buckle, everyone. We’re going beyond vision boarding this week because emergency preparedness is so in right now. Join us as Em shares the ghost stories of Borgvattnet Vicarage and Christine brings us the extremely fucked up story of Leslie Allen Williams, a murderer with a rap sheet 4,502 kilometers long… and that’s why we drink!
Please consider supporting the companies that support us!
Get $20 off and free shipping on your Brooklinen sheets when you use promo code DRINK at brooklinen.com
Start your ritual today at ritual.com/drink 
Start your free trial of Squarespace by going to Squarespace.com/drink and when you’re ready to launch use code DRINK to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain
Get free shipping on your next Rothy’s purchase at rothys.com and use code DRINK
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
